articles.title: Study reveals increase in obesity prevalence among Danish adults over the past 34 years - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: New research being presented at this year's European Congress on Obesity (ECO) in Maastricht, Netherlands (4-7 May), suggests that rates of obesity in Danish adults have trebled over the past 34 years rising from 6% in 1987 to over 18% in 2021.

articles.title: See the fiery Blood Moon rise in a total lunar eclipse in May's must-see skywatching event - Space.com
articles.description: If the weather is clear, skywatchers across most of the Americas, Europe and Africa will have a view of one of nature's most beautiful spectacles: a total eclipse of the moon.
